data.text: Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI Zɔɓe ɠaazaɠani, é ɠɛ ma:
«Ɗa ʋe, GALA Zɛbɛi-Pɛ-Maliɠii maaɠaali nui, ɗa zoo nɛi è va ma?
Zɔɓe Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI wooɠaaʋoteni, é ɠɛ ma:
«Wɛlɛ, gè la ga ani nɔpɛ, leeni ɠa nà è wooɠaaʋote da?
Gè ɓɔɛa, ná ɠɛ ɠila, gè la mɔ gooɠaaʋote bosu ʋolu.
Názu, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI yɛni fiilɛ wolai zu, é Zɔɓe wooɠaaʋote, é ɠɛ ma:
«Ɗa-zaamaɠiligi ɠili eɠɛ ziilo nui,
È wɔinʋɛ gaamazu, è dɛɛ ga gè la leleboni?
È yeezuɓaaʋɛ ga GALA kɛʋele?
Li, è ɓɔɠɔ ɓɛtɛ ga unfemai ta bɔɔlɔi,
Ɗa-yiiɠaawana wolai ɠula ɠɔbu ga nuɓusɛiti,
Waso nuiti kpein pɛtɛ, è ti ʋɛɛ ɠɔɠɔwu.
Ti lɔɔɠu ʋɔɔma fufiligi wu.
Názu, nà ɓɔɠɔi nà è maamusɛ,
«Wɛlɛ maalegi ʋa, nà ɠa gè ga kpɛtɛ nui,
Wɛlɛ ba! Ná-zɛbɛi ɠa saamaʋɛ,
Toɠa wɔɔngi maalesu, é kpa kpe, eɠɛ gului daa ga sɛdelegi.
Kaeiti kpaaʋɛ eɠɛ kɔlu ɓɔi kalii maaɓiligi,
Toɠa ga GALA ná-kpɛtɛanii ma ɓii golai,
Gizeiti ka ta ɗa ná-daamiani tufai ve,
Ná-dooɠo bosuʋɛ ɠa ga dɔɓɔ goi ma niinigiti bu,
Maa ɠa ɗa lɔɔɠu ga dɔɓɔ goi ma niinigi,
Ni ziɛi a vena, é la ɲiikpiga.
Nu ɠa zoo é so ɓaa, siɛgi zu é ɠaazuzeɠeai ma la?
«Ɗa li nɛi, è sua maayikiai ɠula ga kalagi ɓaa?
Ɗa zoo è sokpayeɠei ɓota ga tɛmui,
Toɠa è maanɛɛnɛ ga gola ɓaa?
Toɠa minazeɠe bo è ʋɛ ɓaa?
Ɗa ɠaɠo da nɛi, eɠɛ wɔni goi?
Wa ɓɔna su, wa pɔdi nɛi ɓaa?
Ɗa zoo è ma ɠɔlɔi ɓota ga doɠai ɓaa,
Yeeʋɛɛ lɛɛ ba, è la yeema naama ɲɛpii ma,
